short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates filler text using the Wikipedia page of everyone's favorite Columbiform!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using text from the Wikipedia article on Pigeons, this extension will generate a specified number of sentences or paragraphs of filler text that can be copied to your clipboard with a single button and used in any projects that need placeholder text!
